name: Wedding Bouquet Throw
description:
Contribution to German VR Jam 001

Theme: The sacred four - Something old, Something new, Something borrowed, Something blue

After you are so lucky at your wedding and have followed the rules of all sacred four it is now your task to spread your luck. As the tradition demands it, throw the wedding bouquet over your head.

Make sure to look forward while you throw and throw the bouquet over your head to the area in your back. Only then, the throw will be counted.

Download and install the APK to your Oculus Quest or Oculus Quest 2 via SideQuest.
